data.name: Little Planet - Early Access
data.description:
Dear Player,

This is Yoki from Little Planet.
The day is finally upon us - our very first player (that's you!) is about to arrive on the planet. We have been preparing for this day with great anticipation, and I trust all my fellows are ready for their respective roles - we know this is not a drill!

On Little Planet, you'll get hands-on with gathering and crafting. Sow seeds, plant dreams in fertile soil, shaping the land, decorating your home - each action is a piece of your unique puzzle. 

Over by the beach, our seasoned mariner, Chance, is ready with fishing rods, water tanks... and...a great white shark?! Well, he insists his tank is large enough for that.
Jeff, our shop owner, and his little pal Benny, are thrilled to announce the arrival of their irresistible paw-some products.
And in our quaint little garden, Bella the cool girl is all set with her watering can, sapling, flowers, and..."bugs"! She insists it's important for you to know - we are currently in our Early Access version, and you might encounter a few bugs along the way!

Bella's hint got me wondering: You'd be up for helping us 'bug hunt,' wouldn't you? Of course, we're aiming for a bug-free Little Planet! We're hoping you, our awesome  player, will relish this part of the journey with us.

We eagerly await your arrival on our planet.This is where your new life begins. 
Don't forget to Join the official discord.gg/littleplanetvr ❤

Sincerely yours
Yoki

changelog.change_log:
v1.0.51

New features
1. **New Account System:** Now you can use multiple accounts to save 
different game progressions. Don't worry, all your existing progress will be automatically saved. 
Plus, no more hassle of switching accounts on your Quest headset just for your family members to experience Little Planet – simply create individual accounts for them within the game!
2. **New Avatar Customization:**:LP_Friends:  Facial scars are now available! Who will be crowned the king or queen of uniqueness?
3. **Improved Furniture Interaction:** We've listened to feedback asking,** "Why do I need to get close to large furniture to grab it?"** 
***Now, you can grab big pieces of furniture from a distance, and you won't accidentally interact with items when there are too many in front of you.***
4. **Floating Gifts Now with Thanksgiving Flavors:** Look out for Thanksgiving-related foods hidden in floating gifts!
5. **Upgrades and Rewards:** "My House" and the "Main Scene" now have enhanced upgrade paths and reward mechanisms.

Many optimization and bug fixes

Little Planet - Early Access 0.0.32
new feature and bug fixed compared to 0.0.20 
- Planet creator bug fixed
- Avatar customization
- keyboard entering bug fixed
- frame rate enhancement
- Fashion shop
- Crossing portal
- Mine APP setting
- many minor bugs
